DOC.brief_summary: Cross-over study to evaluate the effect on trough FEV1 after 4 weeks treatment with CHF5188 pMDI qd in adult patients with persistent asthma
DOC.brief_title: Cross-over Study to Evaluate the Effect on Trough Forced Expiratory Volume in One Second (FEV1) After 4 Weeks Treatment With CHF 5188 pMDI qd in Adult Patients With Persistent Asthma
DOC.detailed_description: A randomised, double-blind, multinational, multicentre, active-controlled, 3-way cross-over study to evaluate the effect on trough FEV1 after 4 weeks treatment with CHF5188 pMDI qd in adult patients with moderate or severe persistent asthma
DOC.mesh_term: Fluticasone Propionate, Salmeterol Xinafoate Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: Moderate or severe asthma partly controlled with ICS or ICS/LABA FEV1 ≥ 60% and ≤ 90% of predicted for the patient normal value Diagnosis of COPD History or current evidence of significant cardiovascular disease Uncontrolled concomitant disease
